mapper.insert: insert into business_parking_space(area, operate, num, ps_id, pa_id, remark, state, community_id, b_id, parking_type) values (#{area}, #{operate}, #{num}, #{psId}, #{paId}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{communityId}, #{bId}, #{parkingType})

insert into parking_space(area, num, ps_id, pa_id, remark, state, community_id, b_id, parking_type, create_time) values (#{area}, #{num}, #{psId}, #{paId}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{communityId}, #{bId}, #{parkingType}, #{createTime})
